article.title: Chomsky_%28surname%29
article.paragraph: Chomsky(lang-beХомскі,lang-ruХомский,lang-ukХомський,lang-heחומסקי, "from (Vyoska)Khomsk(nearby Brest, now Belarus)":be:(be)) is a surname of Belarusian origin. Notable people with the surname include:

list.listitem: Carol ChomskyCarol (Schatz) Chomsky(19302008), American linguist and wife of Noam Chomsky
Judith Chomsky(born 1942), American human rights lawyer and co-founder of the Juvenile Law Center
Marvin J. Chomsky(born 1929), American television and film director

Noam ChomskyAvram Noam Chomsky(born 1928), American linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, political activist, author, lecturer, professor emeritus atMassachusetts Institute of TechnologyMIT, known for early work intransformational grammarandartificial intelligenceA.I.
William Chomsky(18961977), American scholar of Hebrew

article.paragraph: Elsie, William, Avram Noam, Carol, Marvin, and Aviva are all closely related. William and Elsie were husband and wife. Avram Noam, generally referred by his given name Noam, is their son. Carol and Noam were married until Carol's death in 2008; Aviva is their daughter. Marvin is Noam's cousin. Also, Judith is Noam's sister in-law.
